document.full_text: linda lausell bryant, executive director of inwood house in new york, says that when people view their co-workers as teammates, they can focus on their specific roles ' and not on power.
document.title: corner office: linda lausell bryant: note to staff: we're a team, not a family
lines_and_colors: linda lausell bryant, executive director of inwood house in new york, says that when people view their co-workers as teammates, they can focus on their specific roles ' and not on power.
